Summary: looked out back window saw a red circular object revolving moving from left to right.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out to back yard,It was revolving fast and was round in object. I knew what It was. It wasnt an air plane.I went to the back bedroom but couldnt see it.it was as large is a baseball.
